author: sfgate.com
title: Calender, Oct. 3
text:
Music
Anders Osborne Almost Acoustic Band 8 p.m. $25. Terrapin Crossroads, 100 Yacht Club Dr., San Rafael. (415) 524-2773. www.terrapincrossroads.net. 
Ben Goldberg 8 p.m. $10. California Jazz Conservatory, 2087 Addison St., Berkeley. (510) 845-5373. www.jazzschool.org .
Berkeley Hawaiian Music Festival 8 p.m. $38-$42. Freight and Salvage, 2020 Addison St., Berkeley. (510) 548-1761. www.freightandsalvage.org .
Brian Culbertson 7:30 and 9:30 p.m. $39-$69. Yoshi’s, 510 Embarcadero West, Oakland. (510) 238-9200. www.yoshis.com .
Chicago 7:30 p.m. $56-$126. Mountain Winery, 14831 Pierce Road, Saratoga. (408) 998-8497. www.mountainwinery.com. 
Conor Oberst, M. Ward, Felice Brothers 9 p.m. $27.50. The FIllmore, 1805 Geary Blvd., S.F. (415) 346-6000. www.thefillmore.com .
Dark Star Orchestra 8 p.m. $29.50-$32. Regency Center Ballroom, 1290 Sutter St., S.F. (888) 929-7849. www.theregencyballroom.com. 
Echo Chamber Orchestra “Looking Back: Music by Ravel, Tchaikovsky, Stravinsky.” 7:30 p.m. $15-$25. First Presbyterian Church, 72 Kensington Road, San Anselmo. (415) 300-7962. www.echoorchestra.com .
Foreverland 9 p.m. $22-$29. Sweetwater Music Hall, 19 Corte Madera Ave., Mill Valley. www.swmh.com. 
Hans Boepple Piano.Works by Handel, Brahms, Scriabin, Chopin. 7:30 p.m. $5-$15. Performing Art Center, Franklin and Lafayette Streets, Santa Clara. (408) 554-4429. www.scu.edu/cpa. 
Lang Lang Piano. Works by Tchaikovsky, Bach, Chopin. 7 p.m. $32.50-$175. Weill Hall, Sonoma State University, 1801 E. Cotati Ave., Rohnert Park. www.sonoma.edu .
Marin Symphony “Waterfront Pops Concert: Hear and Now.” 6 p.m. Lagoon Park, Marin Civic Center, 10 Ave. of the Flags, San Rafael. (415) 479-8100. www.marinsymphony.org. 
Pedja Muzijevic Piano. Works by Haydn, Cage, Crumb, Feldman. 7 p.m. Free. Community School of Music and Arts, 230 San Antonio Circle, Mountain View. (650) 917-6800. www.arts4all.org .
Poor Man’s Whiskey Hardly Strictly Bluegrass After Party Extravaganza, Rusty Springfield. 8:30 p.m. $20. 8:30 p.m. $20. The Chapel, 777 Valencia St., S.F. (415) 551-5157. www.thechapelsf.com. 
S.F. Symphony Michael Tilson Thomas conducts works by Ted Hearne, Barber, Tchaikovsky. Susanna Phillips, soprano. 8 p.m. $15-$170. Davies Symphony Hall, 201 Van Ness Ave., S.F. (415) 864-6000. www.sfsymphony.org .
UC Berkeley Symphony Orchestra Works by Rimsky-Korsakov, Tchaikovsky. 8 p.m. $5-$16. Hertz Hall, Bancroft Way and College Ave., UC Berkeley. (510) 642-4864. http://music.berkeley.edu. 
Yosvany Terry/Baptiste Trotignon Ancestral Memories Quartet 1 p.m. Free. Yerba Buena Gardens, 773 Mission St., S.F. (415) 543-1718. www.ybgfestival.org. 
Zakir Hussain with Dave Holland, Sanjay Divecha, Louiz Banks, Shankar Mahadevan, Vinnie Colaiuta 7:30 p.m. $35-105. SFJazz Center, 201 Franklin St., S.F. www.sfjazz.org. 
Dance
Flyaway Productions “Needles to Thread: Dancing Along These Lines in Continuum Alley.” Site-specific aerial dance. Jo Kreiter, choreography. 8 and 9 p.m. Free. Continuum Alley, next to 255 Golden Gate Ave., S.F. (415) 672-4111. www.flyawayproductions.com. 
Joe Goode Performance Group “Poetics of Space.” 7:30 and 9:30 p.m. Joe Goode Annex, 401 Alabama St., S.F. (415) 561-6565. www.joegoode.org .
Mariinsky Ballet and Orchestra “Cinderella.” Prokofiev. Alexei Ratmansky, choreography. 2 and 8 p.m. Through Oct. 4. $45-$175. Zellerbach Hall, Bancroft and College Ave., UC Berkeley. (510) 642-9988. www.calperformances.org .
Smuin Ballet “Dance Series One.” Amy Seiwert, Ben Needham-Wood, Ma Cong and Michael Smuin, choreography. 2 and 8 p.m. Palace of Fine Arts Theatre, 3301 Lyon St., S.F. (650) 903-6000. www.smuinballet.org .
Zaccho Dance Theater “A Poet’s Love.” Aerial and theatrical dance vignettes based upon Schumann’s “Dichterliebe.” 8 p.m. Zaccho Dance Theater, 1777 Yosemite Ave., S.F. (415) 822-6744. www.zaccho.org. 
Theater
Eurydice 3 and 8 p.m. $30-$50. Shotgun Players, Ashby Stage, 1901 Ashby Ave., Berkeley. (510) 841-6500. www.shotgunplayers.org .
Fred’s Diner 8 p.m. $20-$60. Magic Theatre, Building D, Fort Mason Center, S.F. (415) 441-8822. www.magictheatre.org .
King Lear 8 p.m. $20-$72. California Shakespeare Theater, 100 California Shakespeare Theater Way, Orinda. (510) 548-9666. www.calshakes.org .
The Lion King 2 and 8 p.m. $33-$98. Center for the Performing Arts, 255 S. Almaden Blvd., San Jose. (800) 982-2787. www.ticketmaster.com. 
The Magic Bus 10:30 a.m.; 1:30 p.m. $40-$59. Meet at Union Square, Geary Street, S.F. (855) 969-6244. www.magicbussf.com .
The Oldest Boy 2 and 7:30 p.m. $25-$55. Marin Theatre Company, 397 Miller Ave., Mill Valley. (415) 388-5208. www.marintheatre.org .
Phantom of the Opera 8 p.m. $45-$210. Orpheum Theatre, 1192 Market St., S.F. (888) 746-1799. www.shnsf.com .
